padika maruwime nithiya kada kala 274 denaku eeye(24) nithiye rahanata hasukara gath bawath ,me wasara thula padika maruwime nithiya kada karana lada pudgalayan 4222 kata wiruddhawa nadu pawaru bawath polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari ajith rohana mahatha pawasayi.mathakadi kolambaa nagaraye saha pradhana nagara wala anathuruwalata ha marga awahirathawalata ek hethuwak lesa padika maruwa bhawitha nokirima polisiya penwa deyi.kolambaa nagaraye pamanak me wasara thula padika maruwime nithiya kada karana lada pudgalayan 1107 kata wiruddhawa nadu pawara athi athara wisheshayen mema nithiya ullanghanaya kara para maruwana pudgalayan borulla,maradana,kotuwa,kollupitiya,bambalapitiya yana pradeshayanhi dakiya haki bawada polisiya penwa deyi.padika maruwak yannata kaha irata amatharawa uman margayak guwan palamak da ayithiwana athara me nithiya ullanghanaya karannanta mahesthrath adhikaranayakadi palaweni wathawata rupiyal 1000 kda deweni wathawedi rupiyal 2000kda thunwana wathawedi rupiyal 3500ka dadayakda panawiya hakiya.mema warada sandaha kisiseth dada pathrika nikuth kala nohaki athara usawiyata aniwaryayen naduwa sandaha ya yuthuya.padika maruwak thibena sthanayakadi ho thama para maruwimata uthsaha karana sthanaye sita mitar panahak durin padika maruwak thibe nam ema sthanayen aniwaryayen para maruwiya yuthu bawath wisheshayen guwan palamakata nagiya nohaki wayowruddha,aabadhitha pudgalayan ho owunge gnyathin ee aasannaye sitina polis niladhariyata danwa wahana nawathagena para maruwiya haki bawada polis madhya prakashakawaraya penwa deyi..
